post.body: Luck babe. Happy New Year!
Happy New Year.
gold NYE prty hat? Probably. Snort.
tough being the only woman in a house of 3 men, 1 male dog and 1 male cat.
53 year old husband is younger than me. ;-)
New Year - to you and the Palinode.
You have other things on your mind. Happy New Year sweet one. To you, N, and the little bump.
Aw honey. XXOO All over your sweet Aussie self.
- Mwah. We love you too
But you got an extra hour sleep this morning right? Or at least one later than me??
@SarcasticMomLC. @Amaelija. Love you guys. Happy New Year. 56 minutes and counting.
now you have that beautiful little girl. Did you get a package from me?
- snort. and snirk. I think you'd be awesome.
Are they asking you to audition?
Happy New Year y'all. Must go kiss my boys. XXOO
Poor Dick Clark. My heart hurts.
6 minutes and counting.
33 minutes for the Eastern time zone.
I say 10 minutes of "Failure to Launch" does NOT count.
I just called Mr. Hot a P*$$y in front of the 17-year-old Shortman. Wrong? No. Mr. Hot claimed to have watched a chick-flick with me.
